Title: Cooking the Books
Plot: Bernard?s dodgy accountant has to go on the run, leaving him ill prepared to fill out his own tax return. In fact Bernard would rather do anything than fill it out.
GuestStars: Daisy Campbell, Dominic Carter, Jeillo Edwards, Martin Freeman, John MacNell, Eamonn O'Neill, James O'Neill, Michael Parkhouse, Muriel Pavlow, Jack Pierce, Rupert Vansittart, Tony Bluto
